item.title: Asset Allocation and Portfolio Performance
item.description: Yearly Performance I benchmark myself against VT (global benchmark) as my portfolio is globally diversified across regions. Since a couple of years ago, I’ve been ‘hugging’ the global benchmark tighly. And I only overweight or underweight certain regions/ countries based on my analysis, watchlists and auto-generated signals. The benchmark is not a perfect one because my portfolio consists of assets classes like longer term bonds which tend to have lower returns over a longer horizon.
